input.sentences: this military man is here to speak on behalf of his colleagues .
he is awarding and pinning the award on a fellow soldier .
the men are taking a picture to capture this moment .
someone else is participating in taking a picture .

output.sentences: I was chosen to speak to my fellow military colleagues.
This soldier was pinning a medal on a fellow soldier.
He told me to stop taking pictures for a moment.
He said "Stop taking pictures and participate"
There will be a photo opportunity for soldiers at the end.
